column2: lesion.plots.patch <- total.colony.box + healthy.colony.box + disease.area.box + lesion.count.box + colony.size.disease.area + lesion.count.disease.area + lesion.count.colony.size + guide_area() + plot_layout(nrow = 4, guides = 'collect')+plot_annotation(tag_levels = 'a')
ggsave("../figures/lesion.plots.png",  plot= lesion.plots.patch, width=20, height=20, units="in", dpi=600)
